rep.trans: slowpoke
NAME is always falling behind the group whenever HE goes anywhere.
fast walker
NAME likes to be where HE's going. HECAP walks quicker than most people.
jogger
NAME always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
sanguine
NAME is just naturally upbeat about HIS situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
optimist
NAME is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get HIM down.
pessimist
NAME tends to look on the bad side of life.
depressive
NAME is perenially unhappy. HECAP has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.
iron-willed
NAME's will is an iron shield. HECAP keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
steadfast
NAME is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
nervous
NAME tends to crack under pressure.
volatile
NAME is on a hair-trigger all the time. HECAP is the first to break in any tough situation.
neurotic
NAME likes to have things squared away. HECAP will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but HIS nerves can get the better of HIM.
very neurotic
NAME feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. HECAP will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but HIS nerves can easily get the better of HIM.
industrious
NAME has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
hard worker
NAME is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
lazy
NAME is a little bit lazy.
slothful
NAME loves idleness and hates anything productive. HECAP moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
psychically hypersensitive
NAME's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. HECAP is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
psychically sensitive
NAME's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
psychically dull
NAME's mind is psychically out of tune with others. HECAP isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
psychically deaf
NAME's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. HECAP just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
